@fred_guttenberg This is something I wish more gun fanatics would understand. Despite being in support of very strict gun control, I actually like guns. I've enjoyed firing them since I was a teen.

But that is superceded by my desire to see fewer Americans in caskets from madmen with guns.

Still groggy and confused, you are shocked as they try to force their way into your home, so you resist and — you are shot dead in your own doorway.

Your name was Gary Willis.
You lived in Glen Burnie, Maryland. 

This is a real story of Red Flag Gun Confiscation.
